Title: AWS Data Lab Solution Architect
Description:
Highly technical and analytical, possessing seven or more years of Database and/or Analytics Systems development and deployment experience, IT systems and engineering experience, security and compliance experience, etc.
Possess significant experience of software development and/or IT and implementation/consulting experience.
Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations and virtual teams.
Ability to think understand complex business requirements and render them as prototype systems with quick turnaround time.
Implementation and tuning experience in the Big Data Ecosystem, (such as EMR, Hadoop, Spark, R, Presto, Hive), Database (such as Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server), NoSQL (such as DynamoDB, HBase, MongoDB, Cassandra, design principles) and Data Warehousing (such as Redshift, Teradata, Vertica, schema design, query tuning and optimization) and data migration and integration.
Track record of implementing AWS services in a variety of business environments such as large enterprises and start-ups.
Knowledge of foundation infrastructure requirements such as Networking, Storage, and Hardware Optimization.
BS level technical degree required; Computer Science or Mathematics background preferred. [DB1]
AWS Certification, eg. AWS Solutions Architect, Developer, or AWS Certified Big Data - Specialty

Are you a data and analytics specialist? Do you have deep expertise in AWS services for managing data at speed and scale? Do you think big about how data can change the world, and love building software? Would you like a career that gives you opportunities to help customers and partners use cloud computing services to build new solutions, faster, and at lower cost?

At AWS, we’re hiring highly technical cloud computing architects and engineers to collaborate with our customers on building solutions in database, data management, and analytics. AWS Data Lab is located in Seattle, New York, Herndon, London, and now Bangalore. You will focus on real time and batch-based data processing, business intelligence, analytics, and machine learning systems. These solutions are built alongside the customer and quickly put into production use in a matter of weeks. You'll work closely with AWS Field Teams including Solution Architects, Technical Account Managers, and AWS Service Developers to partner with customers to solve hard problems with data. Every day, you'll be working with AWS Services and Data Lab Customers to determine the optimal implementation, build it, prove it works, extract documents and CloudFormation templates to speed project delivery. If you are builder, and love data, then this could be your ideal job!

Roles & Responsibilities
Understand customer requirements and render those as architectural models that will operate at large scale and high performance. Where customers have architectures prepared, validate them against non-functional requirements and finalize the build model.
Work alongside customers to build data management platforms using Elastic Map Reduce (EMR), Redshift, Kinesis, Amazon Machine Learning, Amazon Athena, Lake Formation, S3, AWS Glue, DynamoDB, ElastiCache and the Relational Database Service (RDS)
Render working, high performance data management solutions, as CloudFormation and reusable artifacts for implementation by the customer
Prepare architecture and design briefs that outline the key features and decision points of the application built in the Data Lab
Work with customers to advise on changes as they put these systems live on AWS
Extract best-practice knowledge, reference architectures, and patterns from these engagements for sharing with the worldwide AWS solution architect community

Hands on experience leading large-scale global database, data warehousing and analytics projects.
Demonstrated industry leadership in the fields of Database and/or Data Warehousing, Data Sciences and Big Data processing.
Deep understanding of data, application, server, and network security
Experience with Statistics, Machine Learning and Predictive Modelling.
Hands on experience as a database, data warehouse, big data/analytics developer or administrator, or work as a data scientist.
Experience working within the software development or Internet industries is highly desired.
Technical degrees in computer science, software engineering, or mathematics
Working knowledge of modern software development practices and technologies such as agile methodologies and DevOps.

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status

Title: Software Engineer - Corporate Treasury
Description:
MORE ABOUT THIS JOB:
FINANCE | Corporate Treasury
We're a team of specialists charged with managing the firm’s funding, liquidity, capital and relationships with creditors and regulators. Corporate Treasury manages the firm’s financial resources and minimizes interest expense through liability planning, asset liability management, and liquidity portfolio yield enhancement. The division is ideal for collaborative individuals who have strong quantitative analysis skills and risk management capabilities since Treasury actively manages the firm’s financial resources which are constantly changing due to business activity, markets, risk appetite, regulations and other factors.
RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS:
Finance Engineering- Corporate Treasury Tech Vice President- Developer
In Finance Engineering, you’ll find an exciting confluence of computer science, finance and mathematics being used to solve for what our shareholders would like from us – a high return for the right risk taken.

The Corporate Treasury Engineering team is looking for world class software engineers to work closely with Corporate Treasury business partners and help improve liquidity projections/optimizations, financial resource allocation and management, cash and collateral management and funds transfer pricing and execution strategy.
This is a one of a kind front to back integrated group that explores new ideas of optimizing firm liquidity position and also execute on the strategy, all in one team. The team is divided into five pillars each with its specific mandate. Whether you like to spend your energies into thinking about the scalable big data architecture, understanding the inventory and liquidity usage optimization algorithms or working with Traders directly on execution of trades and risk management, we have it all for you.
Corporate Treasury lies at the heart of Goldman Sachs, ensuring all the businesses have the appropriate level of funding to conduct their activities, while also optimizing the firm’s liquidity and managing its risk and being part of the engineering team will expose you to everything that’s important and happening the firm. The scale of the liquidity optimization and execution problem keeps us interested every day and we hope to share our enthusiasm and challenge with you.

Your Impact:

Our Corporate Treasury Engineering team is a world leader in developing quantitative techniques and technological solutions that solve complex and commercial business problems. We partner with our firm’s treasurer and other members of Corporate Treasury senior leadership to manage the firm’s liquidity risk, secured and unsecured funding programs, and the level and composition of consolidated and subsidiary equity capital and to invest any excess liquidity. In this role, you will be provided unique insight into the firm’s business activities and asset strategy. You will be responsible for defining, developing software’s to analyze data, built metric calculators, automated tools to help business get insights into data, predict scenarios and perform better decision making to reduce interest expenses for the firm. This front to back model gives software developer’s window into all aspects of CT planning and execution while working on cutting edge industrial technologies.
How you will fulfill your potential:
Use engineering to identify and measure risk and to implement quantitative and technical risk management solutions in software
Forge strong relationships with our key business partners, understand financial markets, liquidity management strategies to develop and enhance our treasury systems and processes
Apply analytics to drive commercial outcomes and communicate with precision and clarity
Understand business needs, facilitate and develop process workflow, data requirements, and specifications required to support implementation
Develop scalable architecture and implement software’s following full SDLC cycle
Explore latest technology offering and platforms to strategize and build optimum technology solutions
Work very closely with business to create real time impact and deliver product with most commercial value

Skills and experience we are looking for:

Basic Qualifications:
Bachelors’ or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or related technical discipline
Experience in software development, including a clear understanding of data structures, algorithms, software design and core programming concepts
Strong analytical and problem solving skills – demonstrated ability to learn technologies and apply
Comfortable multi-tasking, managing multiple stakeholders and working as part of a team
Excellent communication skills including experience speaking to technical and business audiences and working globally
Can apply an entrepreneurial approach and passion to problem solving and product development
6+ years of relevant, continuous experience
Preferred Qualifications:
Strong programming experience in at least one compiled language (e.g. C, C++, Java)
Experience in designing highly scalable, efficient systems
Web technology design experience is plus
Familiarity with financial markets, financial assets, and liquidity management is plus
About Goldman Sachs
The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. is a leading global investment banking, securities and investment management firm that provides a wide range of financial services to a substantial and diversified client base that includes corporations, financial institutions, governments and individuals. Founded in 1869, the firm is headquartered in New York and maintains offices in all major financial centers around the world.

ABOUT GOLDMAN SACHS:
ABOUT GOLDMAN SACHS

At Goldman Sachs, we commit our people, capital and ideas to help our clients, shareholders and the communities we serve to grow. Founded in 1869, we are a leading global investment banking, securities and investment management firm. Headquartered in New York, we maintain offices around the world.

We believe who you are makes you better at what you do. We're committed to fostering and advancing diversity and inclusion in our own workplace and beyond by ensuring every individual within our firm has a number of opportunities to grow professionally and personally, from our training and development opportunities and firmwide networks to benefits, wellness and personal finance offerings and mindfulness programs. Learn more about our culture, benefits, and people at GS.com/careers.

We’re committed to finding reasonable accommodations for candidates with special needs or disabilities during our recruiting process. Learn more: https://www.goldmansachs.com/careers/footer/disability-statement.html

© The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc., 2020. All rights reserved.
Goldman Sachs is an equal employment/affirmative action employer Female/Minority/Disability/Veteran/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity

Title: Cyber Crime Investigators

Applicants will be responsible for carrying out certain specialized tasks as part of their job like; recovering data from hard drives (damaged or erased), analyze artifacts for evidence acquisition. And trace the hacks or evaluate the malware effects on an information system.

Design

Field of computer and information security
Enterprise Information Security

Title: Software Architect
Description:
Job Title: Software Architect
SUMMARY
A Software Architect for Duck Creek Technologies will play a critical role that interprets and translates requirements into a solution that can be configured from a standard set of offerings. Design, code, and/or configure solutions for Agile stories with key architectural impact

Contribute to the creation of the overall solution concept or architectural direction for a project team, as it relates to data handling.

Technical skills
Hands on experience in Application Development using .NET (C#), ASP.NET, SQL Server programming, XML, XSLT (Must)

Communication skills
Good communication skills (written and verbal) (Must)

Experience as Content Developer / Implementation Specialist on Duck Creek Policy / Billing / Claims
Experience/knowledge of Pages, Rating, Forms and Transactional Processing

Title: Senior Software Design Engineer

Planful (formerly Host Analytics) is the leading specialist provider of cloud-based connected financial planning and close solutions. More than 800 customers including Bloomberg/BNA, Bose, Boston Red Sox, Evernote, Overstock.com, Pinterest, Splunk, Jazz Pharmaceuticals, Tesla, and Zillow rely on Planful for planning, budgeting, modelling, consolidations and reporting. Key Responsibilities:

§ Strong T-SQL skills including triggers and query tuning
§ Monitor and maintain database security and database software
§ Bachelor’s degree in Information Science / Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or a related field.

§ Strong understanding of data modeling and data warehousing concepts

§ Fast troubleshooting and resolution abilities, with high motivation to solve problems efficiently

§ Ability to build and maintain strong working relationships with application teams and business users
§ Customer facing skills to represent AWS well within the customer’s environment and drive discussions with senior personnel regarding trade-offs, best practices, project management and risk mitigation

Amazon has built a reputation for excellence with recent examples of being named #1 in customer service, #1 most trusted, and #2 most innovative. Amazon has a fast-paced environment where we “Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History.”

Title: DNB - Solutions Architect
Description:
4+ years as solutions architecting experience of large-scale systems
Understanding of various design patterns like N-tier, micro-services, stateful vs stateless, request-response vs loose coupled vs reactive, batch/micro-batch/real-time, etc.
Expertise in open source programming & frameworks, API development/consumption
Experience with multiple databases (RDBMS, NoSQL) and other common technologies such as Search Engines, Streaming & Queues
Some understanding of database topics like scaling, replication, ACID transactions & Constraints, Normalized vs. De-normalized design, Key selection & partitioning, Caching strategies etc.
2+ years of experience with at least one cloud platform
Good understanding of DevOps technologies, and Containers
Understanding of Load Balancers, Network (subnets, NATs, Gateways), CDN, HTTP1/2, Storage systems, Security (Authentication/Authorization, SSL)
Understanding of distributed system design (CAP Theorem, Quorum selection, Circuit Breaking etc.)
Basic understanding of Infrastructure & Application monitoring

Are you excited to work with the team that enables India’s Digital Native businesses (DNB) to build innovative services with AWS, scaling to serve billion+ Indians? The DNB team in Amazon Internet Services Private Limited (AISPL) is looking for a Solutions Architect who can work with our customers who have built new business models on the foundations of payment infrastructure like UPI, widespread 4G internet access, affordable smartphones, exploding digital content, identity infrastructure like Aadhar and world class cloud infrastructure. DNBs are rapidly and profoundly changing everyday life of billion+ Indians through their services of ecommerce, rides sharing, food delivery, social media, telemedicine, gaming, FinTech and many more.

Your broad responsibilities will include: owning the technical engagement and ultimate success around specific implementation projects, and developing a deep expertise in the AWS technologies as well as broad know-how around how applications and services are constructed using the AWS platform. An ideal candidate will have owned the architecture and designed IT systems deployed at scale, have worked as a part of Center of Excellence, Innovation Centers etc. to investigate adoption of new technologies, have experience with multiple technologies, patterns and frameworks; and is able to figure out trade-offs between them, be hands-on, and can roll up their sleeves should need be to do Proof of Concepts and demonstrate technologies. Candidate should be good at identifying repeatable pattern and best practices, picking up new technologies & constant learners.

The ideal candidate will possess customer facing skills that will allow them to represent Amazon Internet Services Pvt Ltd. (AISPL) well within a customer’s or partner's environment and drive discussions with senior personnel within the company, as well as a technical background that enables them to easily interact and give guidance to software developers and architects in India. S/he should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges.

Role & Responsibilities:
The selected candidate will work with DNB customers to map/model business requirements & user access patterns to technology & performance requirement: compare between various design patterns: discern between variety of data technologies (RDBMS, NoSQL) & compute technology - servers, container, and serverless : design for required scaling, high availability goals, while minimizing the cost & meeting security requirements: design Disaster Recovery solutions for required RTO/RPO: Advise on building DevOps pipelines & process : advise on monitoring Infrastructure & Applications using AWS technologies such as CloudWatch, ELK Stack etc. : Conduct Well Architected Reviews : partner with AWS Specialists in areas like AI, Analytics, Media etc. to implement innovative solutions : collaborate with the Service Teams to identify feature gaps suggest new features & present to Technical communities and customer C-Suite on Architecture Patterns, Best practices, Case Studies.

Want to learn more about being a Solutions Architect at AWS, follow the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Js21xKMFdww

Computer Science or Math background highly desired; working knowledge of software development practices and technologies highly desired
Degree in engineering, computer science or equivalent
· · Experience with Big Data such as Amazon Athena, Amazon Redshift, BigQuery, Mapr and/or other open source technologies such as Hive, Spark & Presto
Experience with AI & Machine Learning, Mobile development, Digital User Engagement, Media processing (transcoding) & delivery stacks (CDN, Players)
Contribution to Open Source projects
Application and Database Performance Monitoring & Tuning
Exposure to Site Reliability Engineering techniques
Active tech blogger

Amazon is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Amazon is an equal opportunity employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age, or other legally protected status.

Title: Digital Forensic Analysts
Description:
Becoming a Digital Forensic Analyst at CCIRC not only requires you to be academically qualified, but largely passionate too!
We are in terms of considering applicants and suitable candidates to become our lawful Digital Forensic Analyst. The minimum qualifications to be held by the aspirants is discussed below along with the other abilities we will be looking for. Job Description Your primary duty will be, to perform analysis of electronic media focusing mainly on the intrusion examination. The task will have to be performed using a wide range of forensic tools and equipments which requires sharp skills of using them.
AIM: To find out the agent of infection, the extent to which information has been compromised, traits of the malware, and/or any probable data exfiltrated.
Eligibility Criteria for the applicants:
A Bachelor of Science Degree with specialization in:
Digital Forensic Investigations
Or, must hold the technical expertise required for digital forensics along with a degree in:
Software Engineering
Computer Engineering
Additional course training in forensic techniques and tools (cryptology / password cracking)
Future with CCIRC: With all these qualities and requirements, we will build a specialist out of you. And give you ample of opportunities to showcase your talent & skills on critical high-profile cases.

Send your resume, relevant work samples and anything else that will make you stand out to contact@ccirc.in

Title: Petroleum Scientist
Description:
Job Biography
A change agent, manages overall projects and teams, to generate target revenue and profitability by successfully meeting customer objectives
Job Purpose
The scope of the role is centred on management of project(s), generating target revenue and profitability by meeting customer objectives. Scope also includes ability to effectively review and manage project progress, resource utilization, schedules, risks, people and stakeholder coordination
Education
Diploma Engineers
Engineering Graduate
Preferred Education
Experience
12 -15 Years
Certifications
PMP Certification

Impacts customer satisfaction by applying and leveraging project management skills and support tools to meet project milestones and customer requirements
Impacts project delivery by effective collaboration with multiple teams and enabling/support teams at various stages of the project lifecycle
Impacts business growth/revenue/new opportunities by exploring PoC projects and assessing customer needs
Influences by being change agent to implement organizational decisions, policies
Influences by leading and contributing to the knowledge management/lessons learnt/best practices
Influences the team by motivating, facilitating knowledge sharing sessions and encouraging healthy work environment
Principal Accountabilities (A)
Technical Management


Skill enhancement

Accountable for upgrading own technical and managerial skills from time to time based on customer/project needs or industry/domain trends
Responsible to acquire multi-disciplinary knowledge and technology awareness at high-level to understand the project requirement
Identifies need for trainings and facilitates technical trainings, knowledge sharing sessions, and through external trainings. Negotiate with customer for trainings at onsite if applicable


Project Management


Project execution and management
Accountable to develop project plans and proposals inclusive of scope, schedule, budget, resources, competency needs, communication, risk management, inventory management, vendor management and change management
Accountable to define project execution strategies and monitor and control to ensure deliverables are according to customer expectations and quality requirements and within agreed budgets and timelines. Coordinates with inter disciplinary teams during project execution as needed
Responsible to deliver the projects with appropriate technical solution that is within the approved schedule and budget meeting quality and safety standards
Accountable to conduct frequent project status reviews with management team and customers on team accomplishments, issues and concerns
Accountable to define key performance indicators for the project along with milestones and monitor them till the project completion

Accountable to monitor and manage project scope changes, contractual terms and effort

Business development

Supports sales/pre-sales teams with presenting and getting into technical discussions. Specially at the time of proposals gets involved in resolving technical queries

Accountable to contribute to meet revenue targets and contribution margins. Identifies effective methods to be adopted to make project more profitable

Accountable to provide clear goals and objectives to direct reporting members, follow-up and conduct performance appraisals and recommend developmental plan. Monitor and coach people to bridge gaps through Individual Development Plans (IDP)

People management
Accountable to establish a positive, healthy work environment to motivate and drive the team members. Responsible to resolve conflicts, in any, within team

Title: Application Engineer – 3D Scanner
Description:
We are looking to hire a Marketing Manager responsible for managing the company’s marketing initiatives and building awareness about how our products/services can satisfy the market needs. As a successful hire, he or she will be responsible for initiating and supporting lead generation efforts, working out online and offline marketing campaigns and managing a lead generation team while managing and inspiring the team. He/she will be comfortable with day-to-day marketing activities, as well as long-term strategy, thriving with tight deadlines and changing needs. If you are a people-person who loves the rewarding challenge of building a brand, we want to hear from you.
Key Responsibilities
– Supporting sales and lead generation efforts.
– Works with marketing staff to develop detailed marketing plans for lead generation and online campaigns.
– Creating promotions, identifying, and organizing for participation in trade shows, conferences.
– Establishes marketing goals based on past performance and market forecasts is essential. Understanding, developing & communicating Marketing plans, including expenditures, research and development appropriations, return-on-investment etc.
– Researching demand for the organization’s products and services.
– Maintaining websites, conducting data analytics, updating databases in CRM etc.
– Directing, planning, and coordinating online marketing efforts on campaigns, Social Media, advertisements etc.
– Evaluating competitors.
– Track all marketing plans and Communicate with senior management about marketing initiatives and project metrics, as well as to brainstorm fresh strategies.
– Able to adopt to ongoing situations, porting and focusing activities with respect to evolving scenarios with emphasis on online marketing in short term.
– Assess the requirements from OEMs and increase the marketing contributed revenue share.
– Mobilize and manage e-mail, content marketing, creative communication and web design to test and evolve lead nurturing tactics.
Qualification:
– Preferably 6+ years of relevant experience
– Should be a graduate with marketing specialization or equivalent
– Highly self-motivated with ability to work on own initiative as well as part of a larger team.
– Strong verbal and written communication skills; fluent in English
– Proficiency with online marketing and social media strategy
– Established press and media contacts will be added advantage
– Metrics-driven marketing mind with eye for creativity
– Must be able to travel extensively, including overnight and international travels
– Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools is mandatory with web analytics software and keyword tools will be added advantage

Experience required : 6+ years
CTC: As per the standard
About Altem: Altem Technologies Pvt. Ltd, awarded one among “Top 100” companies in India by SME India Forum, is an engineering firm with core strengths in Product Life Cycle Management, Advanced and Additive Manufacturing (AM) Solutions and 3D Digitization Technologies. ALTEM is head-quartered in Bangalore, India and operates through the sales offices in Chennai, Hyderabad, Pune, Kolkata, Mumbai, Chandigarh, and New Delhi. The Altem team consists of consultants, application engineers, designers, domain experts and software specialists.
Altem today is serving more than 250 loyal customers from leading Indian and Global companies across diverse segments such as life sciences, aeronautics, defence, electronics, medical, manufacturing, space research and academia in India in association with Dassault Systemes for PLM solution, Stratasys for Additive Manufacturing solution, Artec3D for Digitization solution and MSC Software (part of Hexagon) for CAE solution. Altem Technologies has in the past been recognized for its work with accolades like the India’s Small Giants award, SME 100 Award, Dassault Systèmes Growth Award and Stratasys Strategic Vision Partner award, Top Customer Advocacy Business Award and Best Growth Award speaks volumes of the spot Altem Technologies has attained in the industry over the years. Altem today is Dassault Systèmes ‘Value Solutions Platinum Partner’ in India. Altem is also the recipient of Frost & Sullivan’s 3D Printers Technology Innovation award for showing exemplary growth, innovation, and performance in the field of 3D Printing in India.

Title: SAP Business Intelligence Specialist
Description:
Our client is a leading healthcare IT company providing consulting and software services to some of the top pharmaceutical companies and healthcare service providers in Canada, US and the European countries.

The company seeks to recruit a Senior SAP Business Intelligence Specialist for their office in Hyderabad.
Key Responsibilities:
The successful candidate will be responsible for analyzing business requirements, documentation, design, development & testing of SAP BI/BW/Business Objects/Hana components to support business’ analytical requirements
Provide expert support and guidance to project teams in areas of BI and Analytics
Post Production and Go-Live Support.
Writing Technical Unit/Integration Testing Scripts and Technical Unit Testing Document and executing as per the test plans
Maintaining good working relationship with Business partners and SAP center of excellence to resolve any vendor related escalations
Managing Change Request process
Leading a small team of developers with project planning, work allocation and monitoring
Pre-Sales support to the Sales team through Demos, Product Walk-through and solution architecting
Key Skills/Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or any similar discipline
6+ years of experience in SAP BW/BI in a data warehouse environment with sound knowledge in SAP HANA
- Minimum 2 full-life cycle implementations experience covering Data-Modeling, Data Extraction, Generic Extraction, Data loading (Full / delta upload), scheduling, Monitoring, Info-objects, Info-cubes, Info-source, ODS Objects, Process chains, BeX Analyzer, BeX Query, ABAP, FI Validations, Substitution Rules, BAPI's, BADI's, EDI, IDOCs, Smartforms, Screen Painter, ALV, WebDynpro - ABAP & Java, Business Warehouse (BW), Business Objects (BOBJ) Data services.
Expertise in creating Functional Requirement Document, Technical Specifications, System Build Design, Test Scripts, and Unit testing documentation ensuring compliance with established architectural principles and development standards
Knowledge of SAP standard modules viz. FICO, Sales & Distribution and Material Management
Self-driven with ability to motivate the team
Good knowledge of Analysis Process Designer(APD)
Knowledge in AGILE Scrum Business Methodology will be an advantage
Familiarity with Pharmaceutical/Life Science domain will be a plus.
Good knowledge of SAP BI Net Weaver 2004
Strong communication and team leadership skills
Location: Hyderabad, India
Job Type: Permanent Hire

Title: IT Technical Engineer - Senior Salesforce Developer
Description:
About Nokia
At Nokia we create the technology to connect the world. Developing and delivering the industry's only end-to-end portfolio of network equipment, software, services and licensing that is available globally. Through our research teams, including the world-renowned Nokia Bell Labs, Nokia is leading the world to adopt end-to-end 5G networks that are faster, more secure and capable of revolutionizing lives, economies and societies. Nokia adheres to the highest ethical business standards as we create technology with social purpose, quality and integrity. A truly global company, we are 160 nationalities working in more than 100 countries.

Job Description

Nokia is a global leader in the technologies that connect people and things. With state-of-the-art software, hardware and services for any type of network, Nokia is uniquely positioned to help communication service providers, governments, and large enterprises deliver on the promise of 5G, the Cloud and the Internet of Things. Serving customers in over 100 countries, our research scientists and engineers continue to invent and accelerate new technologies that will increasingly transform the way people and things communicate and connect.
Nokia is a key supplier to help operators on their transformation journey to Telco Cloud business. To drive Nokia’s and our Customers success Nokia requires highly effective internal IT capabilities across Marketing, Sales, Pre-Sales / Tendering and Post-Sales Service customer engagement, digitally and face to face.
The Design and Realization of such Capabilities will be executed in Nokia’s global “IT Business Applications” department. The “Commercial IT” team there is seeking innovative and passionate Solution and Technical specialists who share our vision of bringing excellence in all of Nokia’s Digital Customer interactions with specific focus on CPQ (Configure-Price-Quote) transformation.
Your ability to bring your vision and concepts to life will not only be welcomed but celebrated. You will be creating high quality, interactive prototypes that will be seen and used daily by thousands. You will be working with a highly driven team that has delivered countless successful solutions to external and internal customer teams around the world.
We are seeking innovative and passionate Solution and Technical specialists, who share our vision of bringing the power of cloud computing to enterprises and are willing to work in cooperation with business representatives, process owners, stakeholders managers and IT partners to pro-actively understand and capture business functions’ needs and translate them into IT requirements.
If you're passionate about innovation, come help us to revolutionize how Nokia collaborates and communicates with our customers. The Commercial IT team will be responsible for successfully creating enterprise Digital Customer experiences using Salesforce.com, Apttus and AppExchange application solutions and services and integrating Salesforce.com with other enterprise systems and AppExchange partners. Ideally, you have knowledge of CRM and CPQ processes and solutions and hold certifications of Salesforce.com and Apttus CPQ.
Job Role purpose
Technical software expert, executing software development including research, design, programming, and testing of operating or new software. Supporting business and IT to adapt digital technologies faster and to improve application or solution performance.
Job Responsibilities & Competencies
Analyses technical requirements and translates them into implementable SW designs and configurations. Evaluates possibilities with different technologies and platforms
Analyses ideas and demands for technology and architectural fit and provides technical estimates that can be used by program owner for cost / benefit analysis. Codes, develops, builds, modifies, configures and proposes detailed technical solutions utilizing existing or new technologies
Follows agile and/or PM practices
Aligns the implemented solution that it is in line with the solution design
Provides production support right after go-live
Analyses and studies complex systems requirements and troubleshoots and resolves issues in existing software or solution
Prepares software design, configuration and technical implementation documentation
Participates in prototyping, pilots and PoC’s
Takes care of solution integration and provisioning
Designs and implements system security
Connects and automates data sources, along with building visualizations
Proactively follows the digital market technologies and trends and innovations
Provides technical guidance for projects or solution designs
Develops, builds and deploys solution configurations based on tool knowledge and deep technical and software programming and coding skills
Tests software and is responsible for the quality of software development and deployment. Performs automated and manual tests to ensure the software created by developers is fit for purpose. Handles test planning, risk mitigation and prevention of software issues
At least 3 years experience using CRM, Pre-Sales, Sales and Service Applications. (Specifically, SaaS based)
Familiar with cloud architecture
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree or engineering degree in Telecommunications/Information Technology/Computer Science or equivalent
4-6 years’ experience in a comparable role
Admin Salesforce.com and Apttus CPQ Product Certifications
Scrum Master Certification
Experience in working with Agile methodology
Ability to drive, strong influencing skills and lead without formal power and line authority
Sound methodical skills with attention to detail and process requirements
Capability to multi-task and prioritize to ensure timely deliveries
Comfortable with working with multiple stakeholders in a multi-cultural environment of a global matrix organization with sensitivity and partnering
Excellent presentation, networking and communication skills
Problem Solving
High energy, initiative, enthusiasm and persistence
Fluent written & spoken English
4-5 years experience in Salesforce platform
Experience with Test Automation
Imagine creating technology that has the potential to change the world. Working with us, you will have a positive impact on people’s lives and help to overcome some of the world’s most pressing challenges. We act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. Nokia culture welcomes people as their true selves. Come create the technology to connect the world.

Title: C++ Developer- Risk Finance
Description:
We are seeking an outstanding developer with a passion for product development to join our technology team aligned to Commodities and Global Markets Group (CGM). CGM is the global trading & hedging, financing and research operations within Macquarie and is a core business with strong Global foundations. This is a great opportunity for a developer with strong technical and communication skills to deliver in a challenging and dynamic environment.
In this position there will be a focus on project deliveries across a large range of applications supporting the business. You’ll be part of a dynamic team that supports globally used applications.
At Macquarie we support our teams to explore and grow through experimentation, hackathons, learning and community involvement.
About the role
Design, development, testing (unit & automation), implementation and maintenance of software solutions with a focus on quality and DevOps principles
Production support, including coordinating the resolution of High Severity incidents
To be successful in this role you should have experience in a selection from the following: -
build and maintain new and existing applications using C++ and related technologies.
strong knowledge of SQL databases
scripting – Unix, Python
worked in CI/CD environments
relevant tertiary qualifications in engineering, computer science or equivalent
Nice to have skills: -
build and maintain new and existing applications using core Java technologies will be good to have.
experience with AWS
passion for Test Driven Development (TDD)
financial industry experience would be highly regarded
About the Corporate Operations Group
The Corporate Operations Group brings together specialist support services in Digital Transformation & Data, Technology, Market Operations, Human Resources, Business Services, Business Improvement & Strategy, and the Macquarie Group Foundation. The Corporate Operations Group’s purpose is to power the entrepreneurial enterprise.
Our commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
Macquarie understands the importance of diversity and inclusion - our long history of success has come from being different. At Macquarie we value the innovation and creativity that diversity of thought brings. The one thing we all have in common is our focus on high performance. If you're capable, motivated and can deliver, we want you on our team.
We recognise that flexibility comes in a variety of forms. Talk to us about what flexibility you need.

About Macquarie
A career at Macquarie means you’ll have the opportunity to develop and utilise new skills, explore interesting fields and do challenging work that will impact the lives of people around the world—whether it’s accelerating the green energy transition, helping sustain global food supplies, financing social housing projects or investing in essential infrastructure. At Macquarie, we’re empowering people to innovate and invest for a better future.
Our size and international presence means your work can take you anywhere—across business groups, disciplines, sectors and borders. With 15,000 employees and offices in 31 markets around the world, we’re a truly global organisation.
You’ll be supported by a diverse team where the unique perspectives, ideas and experiences that all of our people bring are valued. You’ll be empowered to address unmet needs in our communities whilst advising and investing alongside our clients and partners. Working with us, you’ll have the opportunity to make a difference.
Macquarie is a global financial group providing clients with asset management, retail and business banking, wealth management, leasing and asset financing, market access, commodity trading, renewables development, investment banking and principal investment.

Job no: COG-953943
Work type: Full time
Location: Gurugram
Category: Junior, Corporate Banking
Group: Corporate Operations Group
Division: Technology
Recruiter: Mahak Maheshwari
Opening Date: 14/7/2020

Title: Financial Compliance Technical Advisor
Description:
Financial Compliance Technical Advisor / System Auditor / Application Control Specialist
About Syngenta:

Syngenta is a leading agriculture company helping to improve global food security by enabling millions of farmers to make better use of available resources. Through world class science and innovative crop solutions, our 28,000 people in over 90 countries are working to transform how crops are grown. We are committed to rescuing land from degradation, enhancing biodiversity and revitalizing rural communities.
In Syngenta we recognize that diversity and inclusion is important to our business, we embrace the unique perspective and capabilities of our employees, which will help us continue to drive innovation and achieve our business goals. Our culture enables us to create an environment of involvement, respect and connection with the communities where we operate - benefitting individual employees and the company.
Syngenta is setting up a new APAC Finance Operations organization in Pune, India and is looking for passionate, committed and talented finance professionals who will get a unique chance to shape up and evolve the new organization. Explore exciting opportunities with Syngenta to unleash your potential.

Purpose:
To provide technical expertise, design and monitor financial compliance framework, with focus on General Computer Controls (GCC) compliance from a group level
To work on continuous improvements projects within financial compliance areas
Support the implementation and operation of data analytics within financial compliance
Act as independent control auditor and assess critically of test results
Plan and coordinate the control testing activities with internal controls owners and external auditors.
Coordinate with IT stakeholders the delivery of testing results and ensure high quality standard
Accountabilities:
Ensure timeliness and accuracy of various financial compliance monitoring & reporting activities and liaise application owners for clarification/remediation actions.
Assist Global Financial Compliance Lead with the analysis of financial compliance reporting from Regions/Territories and with the preparation of presentation material for Leadership Team meetings
Assist Global Financial Compliance Lead in ensuring that the consolidation and group level financial compliance reporting processes
Continuously review and enhance financial compliance sustainability within Syngenta, and manage projects related to it
Facilitate best practice sharing throughout the Syngenta financial compliance world and ensure high standards of financial compliance at a group level.
Ensure new systems and process implementations remain compliant with Syngenta financial compliance guidelines
Participate in the implementation and operation of data analytics for financial compliance
Planning and execution of independent management walkthroughs and testing in the global delivery centers and also in small remote entities, newly acquired, integrated companies and external suppliers, where required.
Planning and coordination of internal IT audits, with internal IT auditors. Facilitate internal/external audits and drive the resolution of outstanding audit points.
Communicate and resolve current reported deficiencies with control/application owner’s
Keep knowledge of control owners and stakeholders up-to-date with training and webinars.
Ensure that all compliance documents are stored centrally in the annual GCC document library.
Ensure timely adherence and compliance with new Regulatory and Compliance Mandates, Internal Policies and Directives as well as Legal and Contractual Requirements. Guarantee that the GCC Framework is kept up-to-date.
Monitor the Software licensing processes and be a constructive partner for procurement on new acquisitions and on new service models (e.g. cloud computing requirements).
Consult and partner with internal audit on all relevant IS questions.

Essential Knowledge & Experience:
Critical knowledge
Deep understanding of financial compliance and internal controls concepts
Solid understanding of control documentation requirements and how it is implemented / sustained
Working experience in Financial Data Analytics
Excellent communication skills, knowledge of internal controls, business process best practices within a manufacturing environment, and auditing techniques.
Knowing about and be partly trained in PCAOB, ITIL, COBIT, ISACA, COSO
Critical experience
Accounting and / or Finance Graduation/Post Graduation qualification
CISA is preferable but not mandatory
7/8 years of audit experience with SAP in a decentralized environment. Experience in coordinating and/or supporting internal control testing programs including relationship management with external auditors
Worked in large, multinational organizations
Exposed to senior management / stakeholder management linked to written communication, face-to-face discussions and formal presentations
Good and firm understanding in the design, implementation and monitoring of internal controls, risk libraries and compliance process management
Good understanding of practical issues and trade-offs faced at country level, while still be able to communicate need to adhere to global standards and principles


Qualifications
Qualification:

Accounting and / or Finance Graduation/Post Graduation qualification
BCom/BE/Btech/Any graduate
.

Primary Location: IND-Maharashtra-Pune
Work Locations: INR Baner Road Pune 411045
Job: Finance Services

Title: CB Tech 500 Engineers ( Client )
Description:
Role Description - Summary:
The Technology Lead Architect designs and develops application frameworks, applies them in response to business problems and participates as part of a team on development-related work. The Lead not only develops code but also mentors other SDE’s within their group providing technical leadership skills. Individual coming into this role is expected to build an architecture view for the platform and work with other engineers in the team for development of same.
Domain Knowledge:
Corporate Banking: Client Administration and Self Service, Reference Data, Entitlements Management
Areas of Specialty:
Software Design - Leverages reusable frameworks, shared services and open source libraries to satisfy business requirements while minimizing the development effort, maintenance and time to market and maximizing reliability. Including User Interface Design with a concentration on User Centric Development with ability to apply User Research to create innovative approaches to optimized interfaces.
Software Development - The Lead Software Development Engineer writes application code to meet the technical solution as well as mentoring and reviewing other SDE’s in the group. Lead is also responsible for ensuring both functional and non-functional requirements are being met by the solution
Responsibilities/Tasks:
Software Design:
Designs applications using frameworks and available components to meet the requirements of a business and documentation of the design
Defines the integration strategy including rationale, integration environment requirements, and determines the product-component integration sequence
Assesses and identifies mitigation for risks including those related to high level design, integration, and data quality
Conducts design reviews and identifies opportunities to reuse components
Contributes to the definition of development and SW standards to implement/reflect DB guidelines (naming conventions, encryption, and security settings) and ensure standards are adhered to
Ensures architectural changes as agreed in the Architecture roadmap are implemented
Evaluates product designs through prototyping - recommendation of new features
Builds a view for technical infrastructure components (e.g. databases, middleware and user interfaces)
Contributes to root cause/problem analysis
Software Development:

Title: Real Estate/Real Assets Development Manager (Yardi Technical...
Description:
Real Estate/Real Assets Development Manager (Technical Expert Role)
About Citco
Since the 1940s Citco has provided specialist financial services to alternative investment funds, investors, multinationals and private clients worldwide. With over 6,000 employees in 45 countries we pioneer innovative solutions that meet our clients’ evolving needs, and deliver exceptional service.
Our continuous investment in learning means our people are among the best in the industry. Our corporate social responsibility programs provide meaningful and fulfilling work in the community.
A career at Citco isn’t just a job – it’s an opportunity to excel in an environment that genuinely supports your personal and professional development.

About the Role:
The Client Fund Services (CFS) Real Assets IT team is seeking a Development Manager. The team is responsible for the development, maintenance and support of the systems servicing diverse real assets fund structures such as Equity Funds, Debt Funds of Real Assets Funds across the globe. This role will report into the Head of Real Assets IT.
This multifaceted position plans, directs and coordinates all activities related to development, configuration, technical support, and performance tuning of the integrated accounting and investment management real estate platform (Yardi), and additional systems and data interfaces in support of the real assets application ecosystem, i.e., fund accounting, cash management, investor relations, operations, data warehousing, business intelligence/analytics, portfolio/fund modeling, etc. The candidate will work with multiple Citco business units and technology teams, and at times interface with institutional clients in support of their integration, data-extract, reporting and custom requirements.

Job Duties in Brief:
Manages the activities of the application development team (mostly Yardi developers)
Contributes to strategic roadmap planning, solution evaluation, system/interface design and development/integration
Extends the real assets data strategy framework, data model/warehousing platform and investor/operational/management reporting service
Sets attainable goals to team members in order for the project to be finished on time
Provides guidance to team members to encourage work productivity
Makes sure the timeline is followed by the application development team
Manages multiple projects at once
Ensures appropriate procedures and processes are followed when it comes to application development
Represents the CFS Real Assets applications development team in meetings
Tracks and escalates risks/issues to Head of Real Assets IT
Participates in design and architecture control activities
Implements design plans, reviews unit tests, reviews code and ensures documentation is complete
Leads in efforts that pilot, evaluate, select, design and implement specific business solutions for real assets
Provides the development leadership to drive the technical effort across the teams, and to make critical technical decisions that impact the project delivery at large
Works closely with project management to assure adequate technical resources are assigned and issues are addressed to reduce the overall risk to the project
Ensures that a unified technical direction is followed and adhered to among development tiers (presentation, middle-tier and database) of the project
Understands business requirements and how to best leverage the technology to meet delivery goals according to schedule
Facilitates and participates in design discussions among architects and developers
Determine and deliver real assets business solutions, which align with overall Citco IT Architecture
Establishes and advocates design and coding best practices, design patterns, and reuse
Obtains detailed understand of emerging AD technologies and frameworks in use for alternative investments
Assists in the development and ongoing evolution of a Real Assets IT architecture that balances current needs and positions for future needs
Addresses the IT architecture for assembling and connecting CFS Real Assets business with Citco enterprise applications. Requires knowledge of new in-house applications, legacy applications, and third party applications

About You:
Candidates must have a minimum of a bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience in either Information Systems or Computer science
Minimum of 15 years technical experience as a developer
Atleast 5+ years of experience with integrated real estate investment accounting and management systems (Yardi Voyager preferred)
Expert level data modelling in private markets (real estate equity and debt preferred)
Demonstrated ability to gain approval and communication of solutions and direction to varying levels of staff and management
Demonstrated ability to lead collaboration and consensus building among diverse groups
Lead roles on cross functional teams for major systems deployment
Strong experience with Microsoft SQL Server or Oracle
Expert in maintaining MS SQL and/or Oracle databases including creation, data management, backups, security and performance tuning
Experience supporting 3rd party vendor applications and interfaces
Experience with Windows webservers (.Net. and IIS)
Well rounded individual capable of performing several roles having ability to work in a fast paced, complex IT environment
Personal qualities: Possess a strong work ethic, self-starter, creative, a focus on customer service, possess a high level of energy, enthusiasm, excellent written and verbal communication and people skills, sense of urgency, team player, strong organizational skills, ability to multi-task, and commitment
Demonstrated proficiency in interpersonal and communication skills including oral and written English

What We Offer:
A challenging and rewarding role in an award-winning global business
Opportunities for personal and professional career development
Great working environment, competitive salary and benefits, and opportunities for educational support
Be part of an industry leading global team, renowned for excellence

Confidentiality Assured.
Citco welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for candidates taking part in all aspects of the selection process.

Title: Mainframe Systems Programmer
Description:
Introduction
We build phenomenal products that our customers rely on so it’s important they are running at their best. As a Systems Management Specialist, you will work with the latest software to keep moving business forward. Whether it’s our Engineering teams that need a test environment or our software running in production, we are seeking skilled systems management professionals ready for the challenge.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Who you are
As Mainframe System programmer Specialist, you are responsible to provide technical support with high degree of Customer Happiness by meeting Service Level Agreements (SLA) and process compliance. You will perform business impact analysis and risk assessments to reduce the likelihood of significant service outage or disasters.
If you thrive in a dynamic, collaborative workplace, IBM provides an environment where you will be challenged and inspired every single day. And if you relish the freedom to bring creative, thoughtful solutions to the table, there's no limit to what you can accomplish here.
What will you do
Adopt the given technology to meet the drift of customer and business requirements
Ensure integrity, availability and performance of DB2 zOS systems by providing technical support and maintenance
Monitor database performance and recommend improvements for operational efficiency.
Assist in resource planning, space management and data maintenance activities for database system
Perform database enhancement and modification as per the requirements
Perform database recovery and backup tasks on daily and weekly basis
Develop and maintain patches for database environments
Identify and recommend database techniques to support business needs
Maintain database security and disaster recovery procedures
Act as support and an authority for z/OS operating system and system components; provide direct technical support as needed in the planning, coordination, installation, and implementation and testing of releases, upgrades, or changes to z/OS operating system, network, and component software
Primary support for assigned ISV products and analyze performance issues.
Support for technical consultation and inquiries from the other IT technical teams
Support for new product installation and evaluation as needed
Assume personal responsibility for resolving problems in most effective way possible within SLA reaching root cause and preventing problems
Lead daily Operations meetings provided there are no P1 incidents running
Aid with identifying problem management trends

Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Minimum 8+ years of experience in Mainframe DB2 Administration environment with work management, user management, journal management and performance management
Proficient in performance tuning and troubleshooting
Ability to assist in solutioning of new design and program fixes in databases
Validated knowledge to recognize complex problems related to functional objectives. Analyze situations and implement solutions, or develop new system elements, procedures or processes and demonstrable experience on BRMS, Tape management, ATL/VTL for Tape Libraries

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
Proficient in working with high availability environment along with alignment to process (ITIL)
You love collaborative environments that use agile methodologies to encourage creative design thinking and find innovative ways to develop with cutting edge technologies
Ambitious individual who can work under their own direction towards agreed targets/goals and with creative approach to work
Intuitive individual with an ability to manage change and proven time management
Proven interpersonal skills while contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
Up-to-date technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing publications

About Business Unit
At Global Technology Services (GTS), we help our clients envision the future by offering end-to-end IT and technology support services, supported by an unmatched global delivery network. It's a unique blend of bold new ideas and client-first thinking. If you can restlessly reinvent yourself and solve problems in new ways, work on both technology and business projects, and ask, "What else is possible?" GTS is the place for you!

Your Life @ IBM
What matters to you when you’re looking for your next career challenge?

Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities – where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust – where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible.

Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever.

About IBM
IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries.

Location Statement
For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. Title: Junior QA Engineer
Description:
We need fresher and trinee candidates automation and manual testing. Up-to-date knowledge of software test design and testing methodologies
How to Get a Software Testing Job as a Fresher?
Trawex is looking for a highly‐energetic Test Engineer/ a Quality Assurance (QA) Specialist to develop and execute exploratory, manual and automated tests to ensure product quality. The QA technician role plays an important part in our company’s product development process. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets client needs, while being cost-effective. If you hold an engineering background and enjoy providing end-to-end solutions to software quality problems, we’d like to meet you. Ultimately, you should monitor all stages of software development to identify and resolve system malfunctions to meet quality standards.
In software testing, automation testing is the use of software separate from the software being tested to control the execution of tests and the comparison of actual outcomes with predicted outcomes
Fresher’s or few months experience in a similar role.

Requirements for Manual Test Engineer
Proven work experience or knowledge in software development
Proven work experience or knowledge in software quality assurance
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
Experience or knowledge in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
Hands-on experience or knowledge with both white box and black box testing
Hands-on experience or knowledge with automated testing tools
Solid knowledge of SQL and scripting
Experience or knowledge of working in an Agile/Scrum development process
Experience or knowledge with performance and/or security testing is a plus
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
Responsibilities of Manual Test Engineer
Reviewing quality specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
Creating detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
Estimating, prioritizing, planning and coordinating quality testing activities
Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback
Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases
Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities
Design, develop and execute manual and automation scripts using open source tools
Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs
Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs
Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements
Monitor debugging process results
Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions
Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts
Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies
Our Requirements for Automation Test Engineer
Very good exposure of Testing and acquired sound knowledge in Testing processes.
Exposure to automation testing tools like Selenium (Web Driver), Testing, Maven.
Working experience and worked in testing annotation.
Working experience or knowledge on mobile automation for Mobile App & web Application.
Working experience or knowledge on hybrid framework for desktop web, mobile app and Mobile web application.
Proficient in design technique, test execution, analyzing the results, bug Reporting
Exposure knowledge to automation testing process and framework developments.
Good knowledge to development automation testing framework as per business need.
Exposure knowledge to development framework for API testing. Working experience or knowledge to design Automation test case for all possible scenarios for web application.
Working as an automation expert
Designing Automation Test scripts of various section and validate data
Design Automation test on mobile site and app.
Executing test cases on multiple machines as well as different configurations mobile devices.
Exposure to automation testing tools like Selenium (Web Driver), Appium ,TestNG, Maven
Working experience or knowledge on designing test case for desktop web, mobile app and Mobile Web Application.
Exposure knowledge to development framework for API Automation testing.
Working experience or knowledge for parallel execution of test case across different operation system as well as multiple supports browsers.
Working experience or knowledge to grid setup and execution test case on grid machines.
Working experience or knowledge to create mobile emulation for multiple configuration and execution of test cases on mobile emulators.
Hands-on test automation experience, in a professional software development environment
Strong experience or knowledge in integrating test automation fully into the CI chain and how to keep tests healthy
In-depth knowledge of a variety of testing techniques and methodologies
A solid understanding of test driven development, continuous integration, continuous delivery both in principle and in practice
Experience or knowledge in several test automation frameworks, e .g Data-Driven, Keyword-Driven, and Hybrid.

Title: Salesforce Developer
Description:
:
We are looking for a Salesforce Developer. As part of the Engineering team, you will be responsible for architecture, design, and development of our B2B cloud-based Web Connectors that act as a proxy between our REST API, various CRMs, and Marketing Automation APIs. You will focus on the back-end part of the web applications integrating them with various CRM and Marketing automation platforms with a focus on software quality, reliability and security. You will be the CRM expert who will design, build and support all our connectors.

Architect, design and develop B2B Web Connectors that act as proxy between our REST API and various CRM and Marketing automation APIs (Rest and Soap)
Work as SalesForce expert and build/extend expertise to other CRM and Marketing Automation Platforms, becoming the “go to” technical person to reach out to for any integration related queries/issues.
Work with Product and Engineering teams through the stages of design, development, QA, launch and maintenance

Focus on security and guarantee the data flow through the web app remains encrypted and secured
Advocate for and apply best practices such as TDD, continuous integration, design patterns and refactoring to ensure code quality
Job Requirements:
Strong knowledge of MVC concepts, object-oriented methodologies and approaches
Excellent architecture and API design skills
Responsible for designing/creating applications, customer objects, custom tabs, standard objects, and role page lay-outs – Deep APEX expertise with emphasis on Communities.
Application development experience with JAVA, J2EE, Salesforce.
Experience with Salesforce.com developer toolkit including Apex Classes, Controllers and Triggers, Visualforce, Force.com IDE, Migration Tool, Web Services is a plus.
Experience in implementing advanced formulas and workflow rules to enforce business processes
Education & Experience:
BE/B.Tech in Computer Science or a related technical major, or equivalent experience
5+ years of Web development experience in a high-traffic, public-facing web environment
5+ years of experience with Salesforce.com APIs (REST and Bulk), Salesforce.com configuration including but not limited to workflows, data validations, tool import, security & sharing, VisualForce pages and Apex, salesforce.com, SOQL and SOSL query language
4+ years of experience in building and consuming REST, SOAP and Salesforce APIs
About Astegic:
Astegic, founded in 2003, is a woman-owned SBA certified 8a firm that has successfully achieved both SEO CMMI ML2 and ISO-9001-2008 certifications. Our knowledgeable staff of over 150 software engineers, management consultants, IT specialists, and analysts is armed with the technology and expertise to improve and extend your existing enterprise solutions.

Title: MEDICAL CODER
Description:
About Indegene:
Indegene is a specialized healthcare solutions company with a unique blend of life science domain expertise and state-of-the-art technology capabilities. Headquartered in Bangalore, with offices across the world, Indegene is partner to most of the world’s Top 25 pharma companies helping transform their commercial and medical operations.
As life sciences companies embrace digital and omni-channel marketing for more personalized customer engagement, Indegene helps enable this shift by integrating commercial content development with deep data, analytics and campaign expertise.
Across brands and geographies, we help some of the world’s largest pharma companies drive consolidation and excellence in omni-channel customer experiences by integrating data operations, and advanced analytics into the design and personalization of customer campaigns and creation of digital content. This is enabled by bringing together deep analytics expertise and contemporary AI and Big Data technology to establish Global Centres of Excellence for Marketing Operations.
Indegene has a strong and established business providing full-spectrum of business solutions for clinical, regulatory, safety, and medical affairs of Life sciences (pharmaceutical, devices, and biotech) companies worldwide from early drug development to mature products. Much like the commercial space, the R&D/Medical side of Pharma/Lifesciences is undergoing transformation at variable pace across the industry. Medical Organizations are increasingly looking to driving efficiencies and productivities in almost all areas of traditional work streams that are human/capital time intensive, while retaining high compliance to regulatory requirements.
Indegene has always been known for its strong domain expertise and is now driving for differentiated outcomes (reducing time-to-agency, enhanced productivities & efficiencies, higher accuracy and compliance) by disrupting the status quo in contextualizing contemporary, modern technologies (AI, ML, NLP) for life sciences by leveraging this expertise.
Further upstream in the pharma product lifecycle, we are helping companies to integrate multiple sources of clinical, safety and real world (electronic medical records, claims, wearables, etc.) data and perform nuanced, domain-specific analytics on them. By doing so, we are helping pharma and life sciences companies accelerate their clinical trials, detect safety signals and garner real world evidence to engage with external provider, patient and payer communities.
Indegene’s co-commercialization solutions bring together all the expertise mentioned above to help life sciences companies drive revenue growth for their brands across the lifecycle. Across a range of business needs such as white space coverage, augmentation of field force efforts, medical engagement, lead generation, patient adherence, consumer awareness, etc., we take end to end responsibility to drive auditable business outcomes (increased Rx and sales).
In several cases, our co-commercialization engagements are structured as outcomes-based contracts wherein Indegene is a gain-share/risk-share partner to life sciences companies. Our track record of success and proven ability to deliver the right content/service to the right person at the right time through the right channel has made us the partner of choice to life sciences companies for externalization of the sales and marketing of their products.

Job Description:
The roles and responsibilities of the Medical Coder include the following:

Good understanding of ICD-9/ICD-10 coding guidelines
Ability to effectively and accurately abstract ICD-9/ICD-10 codes for medical records, as identified in project guidelines
Thorough knowledge of medical terminology, anatomy and physiology
Ability to work independently
Ability to meet quality and productivity standards regularly and consistently
Ability to consistently adhere to the company’s HIPPA and PHI guidelines

Job Requirements:
Certified Professional Coder, Certified Coding Specialist, or Certified Coding Associate
ICD-10 certification or proficiency
Minimum 2 years of coding experience
Successful completion of coding skills assessment
Must possess latest ICD-9/ICD-10 CM code books
Basic knowledge of Microsoft Excel and data entry

Professional Skills:
Strong attention to detail
Knowledge of computer and basic data entry
Effective team player
Ability to work independently
Adaptive, flexible, and dependable
